name: scorpionfish
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a type of fish with sharp points on it that are sometimes poisonous: We saw some unusual species such as the Mediterranean scorpionfish. A new scorpionfish was found off the coast of South Africa.
More examplesFewer examplesA new scorpionfish was one of hundreds of new species discovered during the international Census of Marine Life.Kelp forests shelter huge red-lipped tree fish and scorpionfish.Scorpionfish are robust, bottom-living, marine fish with well-developed fins and body spines.
